original_text: The crowd of people had stayed on the other side of the lake. The next day, they saw that the only boat had gone. They knew that Jesus' disciples had taken it. They also knew that Jesus had not gone with his disciples.
korean_text: 이튿날 바다 건너편에 서 있던 무리가 배 한 척 외에 다른 배가 거기 없는 것과 또 어제 예수께서 제자들과 함께 그 배에 오르지 아니하시고 제자들만 가는 것을 보았더니

sentences.original_text: The crowd of people had stayed
on the other side of the lake
they saw that the only boat had gone
They knew that Jesus' disciples had taken it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수의 제자들이 그것을 가져갔음을 알았다

sentences.original_text: that Jesus had not gone with his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 예수가 그의 제자들과 함께 가지 않았다는 것을
